title: LOL! Jane Fonda yelled at a vegan protester at the #ClimateStrike in Los Angeles
text:
Jane Fonda, best known for traveling to North Vietnam during the Vietnam War to serve as a prop for an evil communist regime, was a speaker at the Climate Strike in Los Angeles today:

I’ll be speaking at the Student’s Climate Strike today in downtown LA. So proud of the adults in the room: OUR YOUTH — Jane Seymour Fonda (@Janefonda) September 20, 2019

Do “OUR YOUTH” even know who she is?

Then she yelled at a vegan protester and said we have to do much more than stop eating meat to save the planet:

“You be quiet!” Jane Fonda just admonished a vegan protester who has been interrupting #ClimateStrike LA speakers, including indigenous youth. Eating less meat is important but more important is an overhaul of work economies, Fonda said pic.twitter.com/mtSUT2rfTp — Sonali Kohli 🙆🏾 (@Sonali_Kohli) September 20, 2019

“It’s never enough for communists like Fonda”:

It's never enough for communists like Fonda — no matter what we do re "climate change," it won't be enough until we change our "economic and social systems." https://t.co/HjPSaCvXHl — Michael Walsh (@dkahanerules) September 20, 2019

Of course, it’s us little people that need to sacrifice. The wealthy actress is also pimping her speaking tour across America:

I’ll be coming to Massachusetts and New York in December for an in-person conversation about my career, the best part is answering your questions! Location and Ticket information at https://t.co/V51uBZitWh pic.twitter.com/Ke36EM3Ccr — Jane Seymour Fonda (@Janefonda) August 26, 2019

How much is enough, Jane?

LATEST BLOG POST: FAME – https://t.co/mJHiBBYCqz — Jane Seymour Fonda (@Janefonda) July 13, 2019

For shame.

***

‘Utopian authoritarianism’: Conservative British think tank director pulls the mask off of the ‘hugely dangerous’ Global Climate Strike movement https://t.co/O7uxkSewU5 — Twitchy Team (@TwitchyTeam) September 20, 2019

‘This is disgraceful’: It’s clear that teen climate change activist Greta Thunberg has fawning superfans at CNN https://t.co/BU8XPd8CL5 — Twitchy Team (@TwitchyTeam) September 20, 2019
